name: Pennsylvania Labor Relations Board, Appellant, v. Chester and Delaware Counties Bartenders, Hotel & Restaurant Employes Union et al.
name_abbreviation: Pennsylvania Labor Relations Board v. Chester & Delaware Counties Bartenders, Hotel & Restaurant Employes Union

judges: Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Stern, Patterson, Stearne and Jones, JJ.
parties: Pennsylvania Labor Relations Board, Appellant, v. Chester and Delaware Counties Bartenders, Hotel & Restaurant Employes Union et al.

opinions.text:
Pee Curiam,
The order of the court below is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Sweney.
opinions.author: Pee Curiam,

attorneys: George L. Reed, with Mm M. Louise Rutherford, Deputy Attorney General, and T. McKeen Chidsey, Attorney General, for appellant.
Louis H. Wilderman, with him Albert Blumberg, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Pennsylvania Labor Relations Board, Appellant, v. Chester and Delaware Counties Bartenders, Hotel & Restaurant Employes Union et al.
Argued January 6, 1949.
Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Stern, Patterson, Stearne and Jones, JJ.
George L. Reed, with Mm M. Louise Rutherford, Deputy Attorney General, and T. McKeen Chidsey, Attorney General, for appellant.
Louis H. Wilderman, with him Albert Blumberg, for appellees.
March 21, 1949:
